mapper.select: SELECT /* clip_SQL.detail */ A.clip_CD ,A.clip_NM ,A.GENRE_CD ,A.PRODUCTION ,A.INS_DT ,A.DEL_YN FROM TCM_SHORTCLIP A WHERE 1=1 AND A.SHORTCLIP_CD = #{s_clip_cd}

SELECT /* clip_SQL.clip_image_list*/ A.CODE ,A.CODE_NAME ,B.WEB_URL ,B.INS_DT ,B.UPD_DT FROM JWORK_CODE A ,TCM_IMG B WHERE 1=1 AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.CODE_GROUP = 'CAIM' AND B.DEL_YN(+) = 'N' AND B.IMG_GUBUN_CD(+) = 'CAIK0400' AND A.CODE = B.IMG_SECT1_CD(+) AND B.MAST_CD(+) = #{s_clip_cd} ORDER BY A.CODE_SEQ
